Revision: 64224d0937405117e3cf5ddc7fb6a08e48cbeea6
Author: Michael Jumper <zhangmaike@users.sourceforge.net>
Date: 03/04/2011 14:53:30
Message:
Fixed copyrect: although synchronization was properly established, draw jobs were not properly reserved in the destination layer, so draw operations would NOT block (synchronized on source only), resulting in draw race conditions. In a copy, the destination layer should block until the source layer is ready. #MsgLength=310

Date: 09/06/2018 00:34:06
Message:
GUACAMOLE-524: Add LDAP attributes to credentials. AuthenticationProviderService gets LDAP attributes from confService and queries the LDAP server to find values on user for specified attributes. Added a Map<String, String> to Credentials named ldapAttrs and a getLDAPAttributes() and setLDAPAttributes() to manipulate ldapAttrs on credentials. Once AuthenticationProviderService gets the values for the LDAP attributes it sets ldapAttrs on the credentials object. #MsgLength=465
